column4: can someone help me with a sound card issue, i just upgraded to gutsy and i have no sound coming out of the speakers
it's very possible that your sound was muted in the upgrade.
you might need to check the settings for your sound card.
I'm not very good with GUIs so I use (from teh command line) alsamixer
oops. that was for changing the mic option.
there's an emma as well... use emmaj to get me
in half a second she'll be horribly disappointed that the message wasn't for her though. ;)
should i leave it on autidetect or alsa?
have you tried googling your sound card to see if there are any bugs for it?
I remember when 7.10 first came out there were more than a few people who lost sound due to bugs for their specific cards.
ok i think i found a relevant bug report, ill get back to you in a bit, thanks for the help
